xmlns="http://www.sitemaps.org/schemas/sitemap/0.9" xmlns="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-image/1.1" xmlns:video="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-video/1.1">
https://tmrev.io/movie/981861-A470 (Measuring Wales) 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500null Art commission for the Mostyn Art Gallery for tour to Chapter Arts Centre in Cardiff. An interactive digital Concept-art piece,where visitors to the show could drive themselves down the whole length of the A470, the main route down the length of Wales,at any speed. It was immensely popular, arousing much interest in the public and media,and featured at the Millennium Centre in Cardiff as part of its opening festivities where the interactivity was an important feature, unfortunately we can not demonstrate this on the DVD. A470 (Measuring Wales)
